member.summary: Tell the package to save itself to wherever it believes it came from

member.summary: Save the package to a given stream

member.param: File to save to - will be overwritten or created

member.name: M:s3pi.Package.Package.NewPackage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initialise a new, empty package and return the IPackage reference
member.returns: IPackage reference to an empty package

member.name: M:s3pi.Package.Package.OpenPackage(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Open an existing package by filename, read only
member.param: Fully qualified filename of the package
member.returns: IPackage reference to an existing package on disk
member.exception: Thrown if the package header is malformed.

member.name: M:s3pi.Package.Package.OpenPackage(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Open an existing package by filename, optionally readwrite
member.param: Fully qualified filename of the package
True to indicate read/write access required
member.returns: IPackage reference to an existing package on disk
member.exception: Thrown if the package header is malformed.

member.name: M:s3pi.Package.Package.ClosePackage(System.Int32,s3pi.Interfaces.IPackage)
member.summary: Releases any internal references associated with the given package

member.param: True bits enable matching against numerically equivalent entry
member.returns: The first match, if any; otherwise null.

If true, fail if the resource key already exists

member.summary: Create a new index entry as a byte-for-byte copy of

member.summary: The "group" the resource is part of

member.summary: The "instance" number of the resource

member.name: P:s3pi.Package.ResourceIndexEntry.Chunkoffset
member.summary: If the resource was read from a package, the location in the package the resource was read from

member.name: P:s3pi.Package.ResourceIndexEntry.Filesize
member.summary: The number of bytes the resource uses within the package

member.name: P:s3pi.Package.ResourceIndexEntry.Memsize
member.summary: The number of bytes the resource uses in memory

member.name: P:s3pi.Package.ResourceIndexEntry.Compressed
member.summary: 0xFFFF if Filesize != Memsize, else 0x0000

member.name: P:s3pi.Package.ResourceIndexEntry.Unknown2
member.summary: Always 0x0001

member.name: P:s3pi.Package.ResourceIndexEntry.Stream
member.summary: A MemoryStream covering the index entry bytes

member.name: P:s3pi.Package.ResourceIndexEntry.IsDeleted
member.summary: True if the index entry has been deleted from the package index

member.name: P:s3pi.Package.ResourceIndexEntry.ResourceStream
member.summary: The uncompressed resource data associated with this index entry (used to save having to uncompress the same entry again if it's requested more than once) Setting the stream updates the Memsize

member.name: P:s3pi.Package.ResourceIndexEntry.IsDirty
member.summary: True if the index entry should be treated as dirty - e.g. the ResourceStream has been replaced
